title: @riot just wondering if you about the scouting grounds vods.
body: I was just wondering since it said it would start on the 14th and there still aren't any when you guys specifically said it could be watched live or on vods from your esports page -_-

replies.body:
We’ll be releasing VODs of all Scouting Grounds matches following the conclusion of the event on Sunday. In addition to our own VODs, we’ve also partnered with members of the press to embed with each of the teams who will be sharing their own content during the NA Scouting Grounds.

*     Team Cloud Drake + WWG
*     Team Mountain Drake + ESPN Esports
*     ​Team Infernal Drake + Yahoo Esports 
*     Team Ocean Drake + theScore esports

We’ll update [this](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/articles/na-scouting-grounds-amateurs-and-dragons) post with the VODs once it’s available and share it out on Twitter via @Lolesports.
ok. sorry there. I checked it after the case and realized that so I'm sorry for not checking that sooner. thanks for responding though :D
